alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:18AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marengo, southwestern Perry and southwestern Dallas Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1117 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bogue Chitto to near Consul to near Miller. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Sweet Water, Orrville, Freddie Jones Field, Belknap, Bogue Chitto, Consul, Magnolia, Central Mills, Dallas Lake, Wayne, Old Cahaba Park, Miller, Dannelly Reservoir, Tilden, Octagon, Whites Bluff, Carlowville, Safford and Hazen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
